item.title: [TIMEX] Timex Group India Ltd. Addresses Signature Mismatch in Share Transfers
item.description:
Pursuant to SEBI regulations, Timex Group India Ltd. has reported on the re-lodgement of transfer requests of physical shares received in December. A significant number of requests were marked with a major signature mismatch, leading to the application of the procedure outlined in SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/DOS3/CIR/P/2018 dated November 06, 2018. Once the necessary formalities are completed to rectify the discrepancy, the shares will be transferred to the buyer.

  • Timex Group India Ltd. addresses signature mismatch in share transfers
  • SEBI regulations prompt report on re-lodgement of transfer requests
  • Procedure from SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/DOS3/CIR/P/2018 being followed
  • Necessary formalities to resolve discrepancies for share transfer
  • Shares to be transferred to the buyer upon completion of formalities

item.title: [WINSOME] Winsome Yarns Ltd Concludes Adjourned 35th AGM, Announces Financial Year 2024-25 Results
item.description:
Winsome Yarns Ltd, a textile company, recently conducted and concluded its adjourned 35th Annual General Meeting (AGM) for the financial year 2024-25. The original meeting, scheduled for December 30, 2025, was adjourned due to lack of quorum. The adjourned meeting was held on January 6, 2026, through video conference. The meeting was chaired by Anil Kohli, Designated Partner of M/s ARCK Resolution Professionals LLP, who is the Resolution Professional (RP) in charge due to the ongoing Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP) of the Corporate Debtor. The meeting was attended by members through VC and e-voting facilities. The business transacted included the adoption of annual audited financial statements, appointment of a director, and approval of the appointment of M/s Girish Madan & Associates as Secretarial Auditors.

  • Winsome Yarns Ltd conducted its adjourned 35th AGM on January 6, 2026, for the financial year 2024-25.
  • The original meeting was adjourned due to lack of quorum.
  • The meeting was chaired by Anil Kohli, Designated Partner of M/s ARCK Resolution Professionals LLP, who is the RP.
  • Business transacted included adoption of annual audited financial statements, appointment of a director, and approval of Secretarial Auditors.
  • The meeting was held through video conference and members participated through e-voting facilities.

item.description:

item.title: [GRANDFONRY] Grand Foundry Ltd Announces Board Meeting Approval of Director Appointments and Resignations
item.description:
